name: TNWAI_004 - INPUT DREAMS
description:
Fourth in a series of live improvised analog video dreams/nightmares. 

Analog video feedback loop using an RCA T09085 television and a Samsung SCL810 camcorder with built-in digital mirror effect. Videonics MX-1 w/luma key ----> VCR playing "Lawnmower Man 2: Jobe's War". 

Music created improvisationally with KORG Minilogue, various tape decks, looping pedals, etc.
